These DLs are united into groups forming the EPAM Global Address List and can be found in the Outlook Address book in the dropdown list \\\"Show Names from the\\\".To be included into other DL types either contact their Owner or submit a request in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/ess.do\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; you will be added to the DL as soon as all required approvals are received.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Distribution Lists can be modified, so be attentive when choosing which DL to write to.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need expert opinion/consultancy in Solution Architecture, you can use the distribution list \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:SpecialEPM-GSATTeam@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Special EPM-GSAT Team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/258b52af-85e2-4e67-9339-4dc5dc1789b9/s4b.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":639,\"height\":67}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Microsoft Skype for Business is the standard Unified Communications tool in our company. You can chat, make audio and video calls inside and outside the company, as well as schedule, join, and conduct Skype for Business person-to-person and conference
